definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_logic_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesboolean">CUSTOM:KnyrSaveOniLevel</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:oni_level</field><value name="VAL"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">(new Object() {&#10;							int check(Entity _entity) {&#10;								if (_entity instanceof LivingEntity) {&#10;									Collection<EffectInstance> effects = ((LivingEntity) _entity).getActivePotionEffects();&#10;									for (EffectInstance effect : effects) {&#10;										if (effect.getPotion() == net.mcreator.kimetsunoyaiba.potion.OniPotionEffect.potion)&#10;											return effect.getAmplifier();&#10;									}&#10;								}&#10;								return 0;&#10;							}&#10;						}.check(entity))</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
